name: Rampig
description:
September Mini Jam Submission

You are MAX BACON, and have had enough Acorns in the sunset and there's a long day ahead in the Miami stock exchange in the year 2083.

But where is your scooter?

Find it. Destroy the whole city if you have to, but find it.

This entry relies heavily on the PolyArt Boar and the Retro Aesthetic assets from u3d.as . The music was made from scratch at the jam!

  • Sounds by Joe Chen
  • Gameplay by Saskia Peschutter
  • Level and Visual Design by Moritz Voss
